page.title: 12HOME LIFE IN DEERNESS
page.content: At the flick of a switch electrical appliances assist today's housewife with almost every task in the home. Many dishes are batch baked then deep frozen as is home produced beef, pork and lamb.{Clapshot}made from mashed turnip and potatoes is a{traditional {winter dish.}Four television channels bring show business and world affairs into the home. Musical families form groups to entertain.{Summer evenings encourage gardening and sport while reading and handicrafts are{winter {pastimes.}Close-knit family units expand to include nearby relatives and friends who are visited by car. {Children}are brought up to appreciate their surroundings and to be proud of their Norse heritage. A variety of {family pets}are kept which include ponies, dogs and cats.
